item.description:
Exploring the world of the gods and goddesses is an exciting and interesting journey. This study provides a greater knowledge of the wonders of humanity and the intricate way we bring aspects of the past into our lives along with our attempts to understand the unknowable. It examines parallels between the rites and beliefs, superstitions and taboos of the gods and goddesses of ancient and present times.

As usual, class begins at 6:00 pm, followed by open circle.
item.name: Class & Circle-Introduction to Deities
